title: Your Best Nightmare

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Target a player tonight and give them a nightmare. You will attack everyone who they visit tonight. If they visit no one, you will attack them instead.
- Eat a player's will tonight. It will become completely empty and they won't be able to use it anymore.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your abilities are astral.
- You can multitask.
- Everyone who investigates you will be given a nightmare and can't speak, whisper or vote during the next Day phase. You will know their identity too.
- When you kill someone, you will take their SOUL and steal all of their attributes unless they would be negative utility.
- If you attack yourself, you will instead attack your visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Give everyone an eternal nightmare...kill everyone who opposes you.

desc:
